mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm_info ( vid, cid, battery_type, rule_id, rule_name, alarm_level, is_alarm, signal_data, signal_time, create_time ) VALUES ( #{vid}, #{cid}, #{batteryType}, #{ruleId}, #{ruleName}, #{alarmLevel}, #{isAlarm}, #{signalData}, #{signalTime}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM alarm_info WHERE vid = #{vid} ORDER BY signal_time DESC
